NATIONAL INFORMATION HOTLINE FOR END-OF-LIFE DECISIONMAKING AND HOSPICE CARE. The Secretary of Health and Human Services will establish a clearinghouse and a 24-hour toll-free hotline to provide consumer information on advance directives, end-of-life decision-making, and hospice care services. This will be funded through grants, contracts, or interagency agreements. The Administrator may designate an existing clearinghouse and 24-hour toll-free telephone hotline or establish a new one to provide information on advance directives, end-of-life decision-making, and hospice care services.
